Trycarbonara
  • Supported APIs

Supported APIsÔÉÅ

  • Cloud Identify API: Calculates the energy consumption & carbon emission leveraging application usage, running on Kubernetes on cloud (aws, azure, or gcp)

  • Node Identify API: Calculates the energy consumption & carbon emission leveraging direct power consumption (using sensors) and process usage, running on Linux (bare-metal) (OS >= Ubuntu 22.04 LTS)
